title: The Fashion King, International Travel Warning, Kyrie Irving, Alexa Too Much and more.
itunes:title: The Fashion King, International Travel Warning, Kyrie Irving, Alexa Too Much and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride!  The blind date story with the ugg mugg had Junior running ten.  The Cheef Luv Officer's advice for Glo tho!  The BG situation in Russia is serving to be a cautionary tale.  AD Dolphin the creator of the Dherbs cleanse stopped by to support Big Dog on his weight loss journey.  Blue Cheese is still dressing and got another piece of grace.  Kyrie Irving is staying in Brooklyn for $36 million straight up!  Alexa on Amazon will now be able to mimic a familiar voice to accommodate new customer demands.  4pm today on Facebook Live the ladies will have their Seagrams special Happy Hour.  The minions took over Would You Rather.  Today in Closing Remarks, Steve talks about increasing the sexy and how to get that raise.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
